title: ihapara sukham ellAm
sahitya:
ihapara sukham ellAm eidi ciranjIviyAi irundiDalAm manamE pugazh sirandiDalAmE dinamE


anupallavi

  sakhamAga viLaiyADum mahAshakti aruLinai cancalam illAda nenjinilE kaNDAl


caraNam    sAvadum pirappadum saDavinaiyuDal adE sama nilaip-poruLinai yamanum toDavallanO
jIva nadi ellAm shivamaya veLLamE shiva sAyujyamum teriyumun uLLamE
